page.title: 11THE BULSTONE BRANSCOMBE.
page.content: The Bulstone is a guest house.It used to be a farm as well.The people who own it are the Freemans.They've got some animals,two donkeys, some goats, some ducks, some hens and cockerels, some geese, some cats and their kittens.The Bulstone can take eight or nine familes at a time.They sell ice-creams. They give goats' milk to the guests when they have it. They also have eggs from the chickens. Two boys help to do things like cutting hedges and clearing stones. They have cleared a field full of stones, and grass is growing there now and when the grass has grown the freemans will erect a wooden adventure playground.Two girls help in the kitchen.The guest house is also a reastaurant open for morning coffees cream teas and evening meals.
